testcase.name: verifyGoogleToken service should return decoded token when verification succeeds
verifyGoogleToken service should throw an error when verification fails
adminController.createMatch should create a match successfully
adminController.createMatch should return 500 if Firestore throws an error
googleAuth controller should return 400 if idToken or action is missing
googleAuth controller should return 400 for invalid action
googleAuth controller signup: should return 409 if user already exists
googleAuth controller signup: should create new user and return 201
googleAuth controller login: should return 404 if user not found
googleAuth controller login: should return 200 with user data if user exists
googleAuth controller should return 401 on token verification error
